Text: How in the world do you extract this?  It always CRC's on me.
I did, tried latest 7zip and Winrar (fresh downloads) ... 7zip gave CRC error, Winrar gave an error about needing additional libraries.

Extracted, Installed and registered without a glitch.

BTW, the KeyGen posted with a previous release still works.

Thanks Stun.

hello! i'm having a problem with the installation. I unpack the exe file and i try to run it but the installer reach 99% but then says to select other location to extract the software. I do that but it keeps saying that regardless of the location i choose to install the software... i could use a little help. thanks!

Installed no problem and keygen worked fine.  Thanks Stun for posting.

People these zip files all need to be extracted individually into multiple rar (.r00, .r01 etc) files and then extracted to the final product.  You also need java to run the keygen.

Works flawlessly. Thanks Stun.

However, why on earth this download is split up into 67 RAR files AND EACH OF THESE ZIPPED SEPARATELY is beyond me :-(

@ Fede184: Because THERE ARE sites where you can't upload big files, but allow you to upload many small files... That's why!

@ Stun: Thanks for sharing this jewel with us!

Everything works a treat! Keygen included.
Thank you for a perfect torrent. ;)
